body: Scheduling would be perfect for our team. Right now we manually toggle every evening.
Inline threads would reduce confusion for design reviews. Please add.
Bulk tag management sounds great. We manage hundreds of entries weekly.
A digest email is helpful, but allow turning it off per project.
CSV export is a must for audit and reporting. Hope it includes timestamps.
Saved filters will save a lot of time. Please also allow sharing within a team.
